summary: AC CONDENSER HAS A HOLE IN IT....STOPPED BLOWING COOL AIR WHEN I WENT OUT TO LUNCH..NO WARNING THAT ANYTHING WAS WRONG.....NO CONDENSERS TO BE HAD BY DEALERSHIP AND OUR REGULAR MECHANIC CAN'T GET ONE EITHER BECAUSE GM IS PURCHASING ALL OF THEM AS FAST AS THEY ARE PUT ON THE SHELF.  BACK ORDER PROBLEM AND A NATION WIDE KNOWN ISSUE BY GM.....AND WE WERE TOLD IT WAS NOT A RECALL OR A WARRANTY COVERED ITEM.  NOT COOL......WE LIVE IN TEXAS.....90 PLUS DEGRESS RIGHT NOW.  PART CAN BE WELDED BUT DON'T KNOW IF THAT FIX WILL LAST....THIS SHOULD HAVE BEEN A RECALL ISSUE IF A NATION WIDE PROBLEM AND KNOWN PROBLEM.
